◆ to_string() [1/21]

std::string to_string ( const DeckLink::AttributeID  value)

Convert a AttributeID to a std::string.

The generated string is simply a stringification of the name of the enum value. It can be used to to and from the enum in conjunction with DeckLink::to_AttributeID

Parameters
valueThe AttributeID to convert
Returns
A stringified representation of value
